name: Cloud Leverage
tag_list: cloud-storage, enterprise-storage, cloud-security, cdn, application-acceleration, global-load-balancing, dns, cloud-firewall, ria-acceleration
overview:
Cloud Leverage, Inc. is the global cloud performance platform that gives businesses the ability to stretch and accelerate traditional, centralized web content to meet the speed and reliability requirements of a demanding Internet audience. Cloud Leverage utilizes a global 32 data center footprint and proprietary transport acceleration network to significantly secure, extend and enhance internal or third-party cloud applications. Cloud Leverage is a privately held company headquartered in Asheville, NC.

Cloud Leverage offers an integrated suite of cloud enabling solutions featuring:

  • Cloud Storage
  • Cloud / RIA Acceleration
  • Cloud IPS/Firewall
  • Global Load Balancing
  • Global DNS
  • CDN
